data.title: Internal Revenue Service
data.meta_description: IRS leadership, operating divisions and principal offices.
data.text:
The Internal Revenue Service is structured to serve customers with similar needs.

IRS organization chart PDF

Leadership

The IRS is led by the Commissioner and Deputy Commissioner who oversee the organization’s operating divisions and integrated support functions.

Specialized IRS units report to the Commissioner's office. The IRS Chief Counsel also reports to the Treasury General Counsel on certain matters.

Commissioner, Internal Revenue — Danny Werfel

Chief of Staff — vacant

IRS Chief Counsel — Margie Rollinson

Taxpayer Advocate Service — Erin M. Collins, National Taxpayer Advocate

Appeals — Elizabeth Askey (acting), Chief of Independent Office of Appeals

Taxpayer Experience Office — Fumi Tamaki, Chief

Communications and Liaison — Terry Lemons, Chief

Equity, Diversity & Inclusion — Carrie Y. Holland, Chief Diversity Officer

Transformation & Strategy Office — David Padrino, Chief

The Deputy Commissioner reports to the Commissioner and oversees 4 primary operating divisions: 4 chief executive positions cover taxpayer service, tax compliance, information technology and operations.

Deputy Commissioner— Douglas (Doug) O’Donnell

Office of Online Services — Karen Howard, Director

Taxpayer Services — Kenneth Corbin, Chief

Chief Tax Compliance Officer — Heather Maloy

Criminal Investigation —Guy Ficco, Chief

Enterprise Case Management — Lou Ann Kelleher, Director

Large Business and International Division — Holly Paz, Commissioner

Office of Professional Responsibility — Sharyn Fisk, Director

Return Preparer Office — Kimberly Rogers, Director

Small Business/Self Employed Division — Lia Colbert, Commissioner

Tax-Exempt and Government Entities Division — Edward Killen, Commissioner

Whistleblower Office — John Hinman, Director

Chief Operating Officer —Melanie Krause

Chief Financial Officer — Teresa Hunter

Chief Facilities Management and Security Service — Richard Rodriguez

Chief Human Capital Officer — Traci DiMartini

Chief Risk Officer — Kathleen Walters (acting)

Chief Privacy Officer — Phyllis Grimes (acting)

Chief Procurement Officer — Todd Anthony

Chief Data and Analytics Officer — Barry Johnson

Executive Director, Lifting Communities Up — Kevin Q. McIver

Chief Information Officer — Rajiv Uppal
